title: JSON Schema for aodconfig file format

raw.description: the column name presetns in the raw ta2 file

label.description: the column name presents friendly in the program UI

index.description: the 0-based index for ordering the fields

visible.description: if true the field will be displayed in the program UI

datatype.description: the data type of the field, values are int,float,double,bool,string,datetime
